channel.title: Emoji on AnthoLaMalice
channel.description: Recent content in Emoji on AnthoLaMalice

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways. The [`emojify`](https://gohugo.io/functions/emojify/) function can be called directly in templates or [Inline Shortcodes](https://gohugo.io/templates/shortcode-templates#inline-shortcodes). To enable emoji globally, set `enableEmoji` to `true` in your [site configuration](https://gohugo.io/getting-started/configuration/) and then you can type emoji shorthand codes directly in content files. These begin and end with a **colon** and include the **code** of an emoji: ```markdown Gone camping! {?:}tent: Be back soon.
